title: Modeling and Fault Diagnosis of Wind Power Generation Systems
type: National Natural Science Foundation of China (General Program)
description: Research on modeling methods and fault diagnosis technologies for wind power systems to improve reliability and operational efficiency.

title: Far-field Electromagnetic Side-Channel Attack and Defense Technology Research
description: Research on far-field electromagnetic side-channel attack methods and defense technologies to protect critical information infrastructure.

title: Wireless Side-Channel Attack Research in Complex Electromagnetic Environments
type: Hunan Provincial Department of Education Excellent Youth Project
description: Study wireless side-channel attack technologies in complex electromagnetic environments to enhance security protection capabilities.

title: Development of Side-Channel Remote Analysis Platform
description: Develop a remote side-channel analysis platform for security testing of IoT devices.

title: Development of LiDAR Mining Environment Perception System
description: Develop a mining environment perception system based on LiDAR to enhance environmental awareness of mining equipment.

title: Development of Mining AI Video Recognition System
description: Develop a mining AI video recognition system for intelligent monitoring and analysis of mining environments.

title: Monorail Video Environment Perception System
description: Develop a monorail video environment perception system for visual navigation of mining transportation equipment.

title: Side-Channel Analysis Security Monitoring
type: Hunan Provincial Graduate Research Innovation Project
description: Research on side-channel analysis security monitoring technologies conducted by graduate students.
